qa.name: Alex
qa.appearance: Young, with messy hair and glasses

tr.name: Cipher
tr.appearance: Shadowy figure with glowing red eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did I know, this game was about to become my reality.
json_to_edit.description: Alex enters a virtual world and gets trapped by Cipher, with Zara as an unexpected ally.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Electronic hum, distant beeps, digital wind
json_to_edit.name: Virtual Entrapment
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex enters a virtual game world, unaware of the trap set by Cipher, with Zara emerging as a potential guide.

qa.action: Alex puts on a VR headset and enters the dazzling virtual cityscape.

hf.action: Alex explores the neon-lit streets, marveling at the intricate details of the game world.

tr.action: Alex's expression changes from wonder to confusion as he realizes he can't log out.

xc.action: Cipher appears on massive holo-screens throughout the city, announcing control over the game.

ka.action: Zara materializes beside a panicked Alex, offering guidance and support.

fn.action: Alex's face shows a mix of fear and determination as he decides to fight back against Cipher.

edit_command: Add a new shot after each existing shot, showing the digital world glitching and changing. Don't modify anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Little did I know, this game was about to become my reality.
updated_json.description: Alex enters a virtual world and gets trapped by Cipher, with Zara as an unexpected ally.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Electronic hum, distant beeps, digital wind
updated_json.name: Virtual Entrapment
updated_json.scene_summary: Alex enters a virtual game world, unaware of the trap set by Cipher, with Zara emerging as a potential guide.

qa.action: Alex puts on a VR headset and enters the dazzling virtual cityscape.

wx.action: The cityscape flickers and warps, buildings momentarily turning into wireframes.

hf.action: Alex explores the neon-lit streets, marveling at the intricate details of the game world.

yz.action: The street Alex walks on ripples and pixelates, causing him to stumble.

tr.action: Alex's expression changes from wonder to confusion as he realizes he can't log out.

uv.action: Alex's face briefly distorts into a mesh of polygons before snapping back to normal.

xc.action: Cipher appears on massive holo-screens throughout the city, announcing control over the game.

rs.action: The holo-screens showing Cipher fragment and multiply, filling the entire sky momentarily.

ka.action: Zara materializes beside a panicked Alex, offering guidance and support.

lm.action: As Zara speaks, her form flickers between solid and translucent, emphasizing her digital nature.

fn.action: Alex's face shows a mix of fear and determination as he decides to fight back against Cipher.

op.action: The world around Alex's determined face cycles through various digital landscapes before settling back to the cityscape.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot after each existing shot to show the digital world glitching and changing. this will enhance the sense of instability and unpredictability in the virtual environment, reinforcing the idea that alex is trapped in a world he can't control. we'll maintain the existing shots and their order while inserting new shots that depict the glitching effects. this will double the number of shots from 6 to 12, requiring us to update the "number_of_shots" field as well.

value.action: The cityscape flickers and warps, buildings momentarily turning into wireframes.
The street Alex walks on ripples and pixelates, causing him to stumble.
Alex's face briefly distorts into a mesh of polygons before snapping back to normal.
The holo-screens showing Cipher fragment and multiply, filling the entire sky momentarily.
As Zara speaks, her form flickers between solid and translucent, emphasizing her digital nature.
The world around Alex's determined face cycles through various digital landscapes before settling back to the cityscape.
